subject: EAR
body:
EAR  
THANK YOU FOR YOUR EMAIL. KINDLY FORWARD RECEIPT PAYMENT SLIP AS SOON AS YOU MADE THE PAYMENT .
YOURS TRULY,
 PARKER JAMES ALLEN TRUST
( LEGAL PRACTITIONER)

subject: Re:   EAR
body:
Hello Parker James Allen Trust,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your email. However, I'm a bit confused about the payment slip you mentioned. Could you please provide more details about what payment this is in reference to? I want to make sure I understand everything clearly before proceeding.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
John
